In fields of golden sunsets gleam,    
Where dreams and whispers gently stream,    
I'll weave a tale of love's pure light,

On shores of azure, waves embrace,

Love's symphony, in every space.    

Through emerald forests, secrets lie,

Where ancient trees in wisdom sway,

In bustling streets of city's thrum,

A tapestry of souls unite,    
Weaving stories, day and night.   

In whispered echoes of distant lands,
